title: Suitcase Lock
text: Check the old newspaper inside the suitcase. Elli's birthday might be more than just a date.

title: Bookshelf Puzzle
text: The order of the books is key. Think about the emotions in the titles.

title: Ghost's Letter
text: The letter speaks of a lost love. When did they meet? That year unlocks more than memories.

title: The Urns
text: Together in life, and now in death. Unite the urns to bring peace to the wandering soul.

title: The Clock
text: Time is a tricky thing. The clock's hands might not be the only thing that needs to be set right.

title: The Mirror
text: Reflections can be deceiving. Look beyond the surface to find the truth.

title: The Painting
text: Art can hide secrets. Look closely at the details in the painting for clues.

title: The Music Box
text: The melody holds a secret. Listen carefully to the notes and their order.

title: The Diary
text: Words can reveal more than just thoughts. Pay attention to the dates and events mentioned.

title: The Candles
text: Light can guide you. The arrangement of the candles might lead to a hidden message.
